Dialog: Hi, Alex! You got injured during experimentation on your university lab, and unfortunately, you lost your leg.
But you build it with recycling material.
And that is when we met!
My wife, Laura, is sick from the pollution on the outer planets, and I had this idea a while ago of a circular economy system where the waste is recycling correctly.
And when I saw you at the hospital full of new ideas and energy I asked you to join me on this adventure!
You finally came up with a blueprint, and now it is time to pitch to some people that could also help us. (connect to what we already have)
Hi there, how are you feeling?
You did a very good job on your legs;
we could successfully transplant them to your body.
I heard that you invented these prostheses by yourself.
Very nice!
Anyways, before you can leave tomorrow, please sign here
What happens to her?
Laura is my wife, she works at one of the recycling platforms.
I think the trash is poisoning her.
May I ask where you got these legs?
I build them. It's an invention made of trash.
Oh, so clever.
I have this plan for a while now, but now seeing Laura's sickness,
I'm even more determined to do it.
It's about having a more environmentally friendly economy for the inner and outer planets.
I'm a huge fan of recycling resources, as you cansee from my leg.
I see... but you are thinking too small. I'm looking for someone with your skills to help me.
Could you tell me more about your plans?
All the trash produced in the inner planets goes to the landfills at the outer, and several people rely on recycling this trash incorrectly to live.
You see how Laura is sick, and the cause is the trash from the inner planets.
Unfortunately,  Laura isn't the only one.
